channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 1, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

May 30, 22:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 01/08/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Migration Zpool
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 7, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 11, 16:00 UTC

Apr 10, 21:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 11/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on the zpool.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will perform filer transfers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 10, 07:00 UTC  -  Jun 13, 16:00 UTC

May 21, 22:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 10/06/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 13/06/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accessible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

item.title: [RBX2D][VMware Private Cloud] - Rack R820L17 incident notification
item.description:
Jun 2, 23:51 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack R820L17 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 02/06/2025 22:52 UTC
End time : 02/06/2025 23:47 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jun 2, 23:12 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R820L17.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 02/06/2025 22:52 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : VMs located in rack R820L17 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their VMs located in rack R820L17.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.Â 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][VMware Private Cloud] - Racks R805L16 - R805L17 - R805L18 incident notification
item.description:
May 23, 16:18 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our VMware Private Cloud offering has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 23/05/2025 09:42 UTC
End time : 23/05/2025 10:25 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Private and public networks were temporarily unavailable for hosts located in the racks R805L16/L17/L18.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts and corresponding VMs located in specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling equipment issue which impacted the network.
Please note that during this incident, hosts were still running but were temporarily unavailable through their network.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

May 23, 11:05 UTC
Monitoring - This incident has now been resolved and there has been no further impact since 23/05/2025 10:30 UTC.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Start time : 23/05/2025 09:42 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : We keep this under monitoring.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

In case of any issue, please contact our support team.

May 23, 10:40 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the racks R805L16, R805L17 and R805L18 in RBX8.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 23/05/2025 09:42 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some VMs located in speficied racks are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their VMs located in speficied racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working to resolve this incident and restore the service.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

May 23, 10:00 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer in RBX8 on racks R805L16, R805L17 and R805L18.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 23/05/2025 09:42 UTC
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 22/05/2025 09:54 UTC

Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
